root: ^There's already a crowd gathering in the inn.
^Nearly half the village is here, talking loudly about wild rumours, misinforming, and just generally enjoying themselves.

c-0: ^Me and Ceara scout Illij sitting by a corner table alone as he usually does.
^We sit down next to him before he even notices us.

IllijTalk: ^"Well, you"re in for something at least. This guy's the real deal."
Questions: ^What did Mikal say? Did he meet him?

who: ^"Sages who deal with curses and demons."
what: ^"He's probably heading to Caudden, but Mikal said he"d stay here a few days for some reason. Maybe he wants to see the city from out here. Who knows."
curses: ^"We don't? You never really know until he's had a look around the place. They tend to spot things like that as the first, too."
know: ^"Yeah, maybe. If it's who I think."
sage: ^"His name is Derec. He... rid my last village of a curse that had the cows eat bad food, producing terrible milk for several months. He whisked it away in seconds.
mikal: ^"Says he did, yeah. Out by Furrow, on his way back from a Courier trip."
nomorequestions: ^"Who's going to talk to him?" >Ceara asks.<
^"Who isn't? Half the town's already here, waiting eagerly..."
mother: ^"My mother's gonna speak to him?" >Ceara asks, again.<
^"Says she's planning on it. You want to speak to him too, don't you?"

c-0: ^"Get in line, then. It's rare to see someone like that here" >Illij says.  <
^"Most of them dart directly into Caudden and never look back" >Ceara says.<
^"Exactly. This one's staying, which makes him interesting."
c-1: ^"Bah, you know you want to. No reason to hide it. I don't care that you act all tough. It's only natural to have questions" >Illij says.<
c-2: ^"Hah, you little liar. Don't try to act tough around me, I can see right through that. You got the same negativity, Ceara?"
^>He shakes his head.< "Bunch of girls, you are."
when: ^>But I don't get to ask that question. Ceara and Illij both look away from me.<
